flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=3000>>3000
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $3000 / 2 = $<<3000/2=1500.0>>1500.0
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $1500.0 + $10 = $<<1500.0+10=1510.0>>1510.0 to the shelter.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
